amendment.description: Amendment sought to require companies holding leases which allow them to drill on public lands off-shore without paying a royalty, to renegotiate those leases prior to bidding on new leases issued pursuant to Title I of the Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 7 printed in House Report 113-493 to require companies holding leases, which allow them to drill on public lands off-shore without paying a royalty, to renegotiate those leases prior to bidding on new leases issued pursuant to Title I of the Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 229 (Roll no. 364).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 229 (Roll no. 364).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Blumenauer.
